name: Afternoon School-Indie Horror Game VHS Style
name_original: Afternoon School-Indie Horror Game VHS Style
description:
HI! ITS MY NEW INDIE HORROR GAME ABOUT AFTERNOON SCHOOL!

This is VHS Style indie horror game,where you at afternoon school. 

This game was maded by Docent(me) for about one week!

Wish you enjoy and record video about my game,like,subscribe,maybe you pay me for this OR write comment with your opinion about game: what you like,what dislike.
